comment: She is by far the best college professor out there! her exams are easy to study bc it is material we use to take notes and study off of that. I wish more teachers were like her and break up chapters in different units. she did mutliple extra credit and very considerate if u cant make it to class. best class and teacher ever!!!!
Love this professor, she gives bonus questions in the test and if you study her powerpoints you will succeed in this class. They are exactly like the exams

Professor Smith is the best a&p2 teacher at Kennesaw!! She explains everything very easily and it is so easy to understand her teaching. The tests are easy and come from the PowerPoints. She also answers emails ASAP. Love her!! 12/10!

Professor Smith is amazing! She makes Anatomy so interesting! She is very organized, always ready to answer questions, and responds back to emails very quickly. She is so caring and wants you to succeed! Although Anatomy is very heavy in material and can be difficult, she makes it manageable. 10/10 recommend! One of the best professors at KSU!

Prof. Smith is the best Anatomy professor ever. She is organized, a quick grader, and gives lots of extra credit. She is caring, understanding, and so relatable. She respects her students and wants them to succeed. To study, I listened to recorded lectures and followed with her power points. Make Quizlet flashcards! (Don't read the textbook).

Professor Smith is the best professor I have had a KSU so far. She is very understanding and listens to any concerns you have. Her lectures are very informative and they dont include unnecessary information. Her tests are simple and as long as you pay attention and review the powerpoints youll be fine! I wish I could have her for all my classes.

Professor Smith is the best choice for a A&P teacher. She answers almost any question you could possibly think of and if she doesnt know she will literally research the topic to come back to class and answer it the next day. Tests are not extremely difficult but if you dont attend class it will be hard to pass. She is a great choice for A&P2
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Caring

comment: Professor Smith is the most understanding and compassionate professor I've come across at KSU. She makes everything very clear and makes sure you have everything you need to be able to succeed in the class. She is great at answering questions and she always does so kindly. She has a cute sense of humor that makes the lectures even better. :D
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: BEST ANATOMY PROFESSOR AT KENNESAW STATE! Professor Ivy is so helpful and just a sweet person. Please yall take her class!

AMAZING! If anyone says otherwise it's just because they haven't come across a class with the level of difficulty that A&P2 is. She makes it interesting to learn about, loves to answer any questions, and is super easy to reach outside of class. She teaches you everything you need to know in the easiest fashion! PLEASE TAKE HER! BEST professor ever!
Professor Smith is the best, shes so helpful and kind. Shes difficult but not unreasonable. Would take her class again.
